resources.string: Prevent other people from viewing your list of networks by only enabling them when they are in range (will not work with hidden hotspots)
Only allow connections to access points when they should be available (by asking you the first time you connect to a new access point)
Are you sure network "%1$s" should be available right now?
Filling in our survey helps us perform research, and allows us to provide apps such as this one in the future. Fill in the survey by touching this notification.
